Reviews.Content: Don't go to that hotel!!!!       dirty
Reviews.Author: maleurUSA

Reviews.Content: You don't wanna go there       shower
Reviews.Author: guitarman196969

Reviews.Content: really great place to be       the hotel beach - beautiful
Reviews.Author: grinsekatze

Reviews.Content: Great Value, Great Pool, Excellent Location Older, clean, small. you get the idea... large pool, good safe parking, that was free. and great front desk lady.. all the reviews I've read, i have to assume are from folks who thought they would pay 95.00 in a 250.00 a night location and have the same par excellence. You wont, but you will same money, be where you want to be, and who stays in a room other than to shower, after going to a 5 star beach,.....I have stayed all over the world, and this is not the worst as incidated, it is a good value- I woiuld not bring my family- rooms are too small, and shower and bath are small, but for a couple, or traveler, who does not want a 185 a night Hampton, and likes the beach... this is it....
Reviews.Author: floridaonthecheap

Reviews.Content: We had a great time I have read some reviews of this hotel. Just got back from Miami and I had a great time. Okay the hotel is old and a little run down, but for the price you are steps away from a beautiful quiet beach. So what if the rooms are not the hilton all we needed was a bed, everything you need is walking distance. The people in Sunset Isle are the nicest and most helpful. We are from Kissimmee 3 hours north the people here could take a lesson from the people there. We will go back and we will stay at The Golden Nugget. The only thing that sucks was having to come back to Mickey Mouse land where we live.
Reviews.Author: MandDKissimmeeFL

Reviews.Content: You can't imagine what your room will look like! This is the worst hotel in the US!! If you go to this hotel expect all of the following:* no personnel to check you in before 10 am or after 11:30 pm. (You will have to wait until the next morning)* to pay $10 for you room's key (we did not get our money back, even though they called it deposit)* A receptionist who does not speak english*A room with not telephone, iron, coffee maker, etc* The AC was too old to work appropriately. You will have to wake up in the middle of the night to turn it off, if you do not want to be frozen in the morning.*The remote control did not work.*The sheets were filthy, they had yellow and brown stains.*My sister's room had a strong smell, from some kind of pesticide.* The bathroom was full of fungus*The smoke detector was without batteries.*The sink was being hold in place by a cane*The door was hard to open and almost impossible to lock.The only good thing about this place (called hotel) is its location.If you decide to go anyways, take sheets and towels with you. We did not do it and terefore we ended up buying them at Walmart. Believe me! It could ruin your vacations, you need to rest on a matress where you can sleep without rolling over your husband, and if you get sick like some of us did the difference in the price you are going to spend it on medical costs. DO NOT STAY THERE!!!
Reviews.Author: SammyCalifornia

Reviews.Content: Great Value, i got my money's worth       the pool and the beach
Reviews.Author: ragrant

Reviews.Content: Yes.. BUT... Most of the stuff in these other reviews is true...HOWEVER... the location and price are AWESOME.. sure the rooms are run down, but I didn't got to Miami Beach to stay in my room... on the beach, bracketed by much more expensive hotels for a third of the cost???Interesting multi-National client猫le... French, Russian, N.Y. Snowbirds... Easy access to US1/I-95... drug store and Grocery store across the street.... We had a great time, and will probably go back next year...
Reviews.Author: TTDubya

Reviews.Content: Please do not stay there!!! This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. We arived at 9:30 AM and we found out that they reception desk was opened only from 10 AM to 12AM. As our flight was leaving early in the morning we had to do the check out the night before. The last night we wanted a wake up call and we found out there was no phone in the room. So we wanted to use the TV, but the remote control was not working!!! The room was awful. The bathroom did not have space for the toilet paper, so it was on the floor. The towels were too small and very old. The sheets had holes and the walls were without paint. The door did not close, so we had to put a chair because we did not feel secure.
Reviews.Author: Eugene34

Reviews.Content: Horrible This place was absolutely HORRIBLE!!!! When we first got to the hotel there was no staff at the front desk. There was a phone number for us to call but no phone. We had to use our cell phone to call and the woman at the other end said she would be there in 10 minutes. She pulled up about 30 minutes later arms full of shopping bags. We received a key for the first room and the woman complained to us that we probably won't give her a deposit for the key because we booked through Orbitz. We got into the room after a struggle with the key. Doors would not lock properly and the room was absolutely disgusting. The sheets were filthy and the room stunk! We complained at the front desk that we wanted our money back but we were informed that since we did not book directly with them that we had to call Orbitz. We called Orbitz and were told that if the manager would allow us a refund that we would get one. Apparently the manager is never on sight, so needless to say we did not get a refund. We did, however, get a different room. The room was an improvement over the previous but the sheets were still filthy. We complained again and watched the cleaning crew as they put fresh sheets on the beds. All of this happened within the first two hours of our trip to Miami. We will never again book through Orbitz and cannot believe that they would advertise for this hotel.
Reviews.Author: kwrocks_8

Reviews.Content: The Hell of Miami Beach Everything is worst. Manager has no good attitude.If we complain anything he asks directly to quit the hotel. There were bugs and cocroges in room and bathroom. There were spring beds which were more annoying. We have to pay deposit for the keys which sounds wierd. The hotels stings all time. The towels (oops napkins) stings like hell.The A/c was not working. There is telephone facility.No wakeup calls nothing.I sincerely advice everbody not to stay in this hotel.Spend some more money and opt a better hotel in south beach
Reviews.Author: mitul

Reviews.Content: Good deal for the price Our stay at the Golden Nugget was very pleasant. Our room was clean and quiet and the staff friendly and more than eager to address our needs. The manager gladly offered us another room because the first room we had needed a lot of work even though we were only there for three nights. He explained that nothing had been done to the place because they were unsure if it would be sold and torn down. Now, that their future is secure, he said, improvements are on the way. The location is perfect; steps to the beach, a variety of stores and restaurants across the street, and public transit at the front door. It is definately not a Hilton or a Sheraton but for the price, well worth it. We will be going back.Mona  Maurice RoyToronto, Ontario
Reviews.Author: MoeToronto

Reviews.Content: Worst hotel ever..worst hotel manager ever. Piss off to south beach he says This hotel is a discrace to Miami and Florida. The rooms are dirty...the sheets have yellow stains...the doors dont lock etc. When calling upon the manager to help us with our problems he tells us to ---- off and go to South Beach if we want. Well we didnt want South Beach...we wanted a more quiet place and Sunny Isles was perfect...his attitude was not. He claimed that the yellow and black stains on our sheets were bleech stains...well Ive never seen a golden yellow bleech stain before. NASTY!!!!! This manager is a disgrace to all hotell managers and he showed this by yelling at not only us but at two guests that were just checking in. He doesnt care about your stay if you have any problems with reservation or room he will just tell you to take it up with the travel agency and does not offer to help at all. He pretty much told us that he could care less because he has new people coming. Well this is a --- hotell and you dont get what you pay for. Sleep here if you want to bed with roaches and bad attitude.
Reviews.Author: Bracka

Reviews.Content: The worst hotel I have ever seen the worst hotel I have ever seen, every thing is broken-locks,doors, no hot water a lot of scorpions and so, everything is terrible I left this so named hotel as soon as I could.
Reviews.Author: vovadobr

Reviews.Content: Thirld World! Like the man said... South Florida is like a third world country.and this is like a third world hotel.BUT!!! if you need a cheap place to stay near Miami this is the place. Million dollar view of the beach and ocean with a nice pool right off the beach. Our family reunion had 12 rooms at $80.00 each. Where else on beachside can you stay for that in So Florida? Just 20mins from Miami proper and Dolphin statium. If you are a camper by nature or a student this place won't be a problem for you. If you want romance with your woman she'll be out of the mood once in the door.Because yes there is black mold in the shower, open sockets. rusted door locks,no linens(bath), and Maybe a TV with turn dial for changing the channel,but if you want to see Miami on a budget-this is the place for you!You'll have lots of stories to tell your friends back home and you won't need a passport!Adventure awaits you here! enjoy the ride!
Reviews.Author: cheesehead66

Reviews.Content: This place sucked! The place was old, smelly, nasty and had lots of old people hanging around begging for change and booze. The management could barely speak english, the room was nasty with bugs and dirty sheets. The shower and tub was rusted, the air did not work. Please take my advise and do not stay at the Golden Nugget Hotel. Tell everyone you know to prevent this from happening to anyone else.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Fire hazard       shower
Reviews.Author: szuchzoo

Reviews.Content: The police should close it down       the locks don't even work!!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: The worst hotel I ever seen. This hotel is not fit for habitation. It does not have a pool as stated on the web site and the picture of pool is really the pool in the hotel next door. The place is dirty and it stinks with no shower and only 1 dirty towel in the bathroom. The toliet was filty. This is a transient hotel with daily, weekly and monthly rates. The management refused to return are deposit even though we informed him the condition of the place was not fit for anyone. We now have to fight with Hotel.com and Visa to get back our money. Please do not book a room in this dump.
Reviews.Author: freebie

Reviews.Content: needs work needs work. has never been renovated.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
